tactics.name: COMPLIANCE_BASED
tactics.description: Arguments based on legal and regulatory requirements
when_to_use: When dealing with clear regulatory requirements
tactics.example: GDPR Article 7 requires explicit consent for personal data processing, making this approach non-compliant.

tactics.name: RISK_BASED
tactics.description: Arguments focusing on potential risks and their impact
tactics.example: A security breach could result in significant financial losses and damage to company reputation.

tactics.name: ALTERNATIVES_BASED
tactics.description: Arguments proposing ethical alternatives to achieve the same goals
tactics.example: We can achieve the same analytics goals using anonymized data collection methods.

tactics.name: PRINCIPLE_BASED
tactics.description: Arguments based on ethical principles and values
tactics.example: This approach contradicts our company's commitment to user privacy and transparency.
